item.description: Hello, Our book discussion at the November 12 meetup will be "Living Buddha, Living Christ" by Thich Nhat Hanh, published by Riverhead Books. This book was originally published in 1995, and has become a classic. Thich Nhat Hanh, a Vietnamese monk who lives in France, has been part of a decades-long dialogue between Christians and Buddhists. "In a lucid, meditative prose, he explores the crossroads of compassion and holiness at which the two traditions meet..." Join us for this very interesting discussion.
item.name: Nov. 12th discussion: "Living Buddha, Living Christ"
